text: Appassionata is the colloquial name of Piano Sonata No. 23 by Beethoven. Appassionata may also refer to: * Appassionata (1944 film), a 1944 Swedish film * Appassionata (1974 film), a 1974 Italian erotic drama film * Appassionata (Ramsey Lewis album), 1999 * Appassionata (Maksim Mrvica album), 2010 ==See also== *Apasionada
title: Appassionata (disambiguation)
